condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 2.8 Multi Country: Communities and Government have the capacity in coping with disasters and adapting to the climate change in relation to WASH Sector

description.narrative: UNICEF continued to support efforts in Pacific Island Countries and Territories to build resilience to disaster, incorporating climate change adaptation and disaster risk reduction in key water, sanitation and hygiene plans, introducing security matters in drinking water safety and security planning and building the capacity of in-country emergency coordination mechanisms. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:18/12/2017
